tree_id: You wake up in an old rundown hospital with no memory of how you got there. You look around and see
context: broken equipment lying around the room. The hospital seems to be completely empty.
first_story_block: leave the hospital and see if there is anything outside.

action_results.action: Outside the hospital you see a worn down road and empty cars. Everything is strangely quiet and you start getting worried. You feel hungry and wonder when the last time you ate was.
action_results.result: try to find a working car.

action_results.action: You find a car with the keys in the ignition and try to start it. Nothing happens. You keep looking and find another car that looks like it might work. You manage to get the engine started.
action_results.result: drive around looking for any people or stores that might have supplies.

action_results.action: You drive around the town and see many boarded up buildings, but no people. Eventually you find a store that you think might have supplies.
action_results.result: go inside the store and see if there are any supplies.

action_results.action: It looks like the store has been ransacked and all the shelves are empty. You manage to find a package of granola bars and a flashlight behind the counter.
action_results.result: eat a granola bar.

action_results.action: You feel a little bit better. But you're still hungry.
action_results.result: eat another granola bar.

action_results.action: You feel better. You should probably save the rest of your food though.
action_results.result: leave the store and get back in the car.

action_results.action: As you leave the store you notice movement out behind your car. A man steps out with a hungry look in his eyes. His clothes are in tatters and he is carrying a crowbar.
action_results.result: run at the man and attack him.

action_results.action: You run forward to attack the man. His crowbar crashes into your chest and you fall to the ground. He kicks you a few times and then grabs your granola bars and runs off.
action_results.result: go after him.

action_results.action: You go after him. As you try and stand up though you realize you're in extreme pain. You think one of your ribs is broken. You manage to get yourself on your feet, but realize catching him is impossible.
action_results.result: look for something to wrap your chest with.

action_results.action: You walk back into the store and find a few shirts that you tear and wrap around your chest. It helps you feel slightly better. But you're still in a lot of pain.
take a quick rest
action_results.result: You slouch down to the ground and try to breathe steadily. The pain beings to magnify. You wonder what has happened to the world and if there are more hostile people out there like the guy who attacked you.

action_results.action: move further to the back of the store
action_results.result: Worried there are more hostiles around, you drag yourself to the back corner of the store.

action_results.action: access the area
action_results.result: The corner is a bit dark as the natural light hardly reaches there. There also seems to be some rubbish on the floor.

action_results.action: lay down the corner
action_results.result: You feel a little dizzy so you bring yourself to the dark corner to rest a bit.

action_results.action: take a short rest
action_results.result: You awaken to the sound of some footsteps nearby. Being a bit startled you pull yourself more into the dark corner. A sharp pain goes rings up from your ribcage.

action_results.action: listen for the footsteps
action_results.result: After you moved you couldn't hear the footsteps anymore. You try to steady your heart rate and your breathing. After a few minutes you hear the footsteps again.

action_results.action: stay quiet
action_results.result: A back door opens to your right and it startles you. You feel a cough well up inside you.

action_results.action: hold in the cough
action_results.result: You place you hand over your mouth as you see a women cautiously come inside. She doesn't really look harmful but who knows what could be on her mind.

action_results.action: stay hidden and attempt to escape
action_results.result: The woman looks around and beings to check the materials and rubbish scattered around on the floor mostly in the well lit areas. Your cough lets out.

action_results.action: make a run for the back door
action_results.result: You dash out the back door and hear the woman scream, "Wait! Watch out!!". You take a few steps forward through the door and suddenly fall down into a hole. You are knocked unconscious.
